name: sky-attack
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
short_effect: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A second-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.platinum: A second-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A second-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also make the target flinch.
